in general can have a somewhat sanitized setting where they are justified to torture a living creature. In the world of Yukkuri, Yukkuri are often shown as harmful creatures that harm the environment and are completely selfish and deplorable. In that world, those who oppose abuse of Yukkuris have no other argument than that of sympathy. Animal abusers in the real world face much more criticisms besides just "animals are cute and you shouldn't torture" thus this fantasy world of theirs is created where these other criticisms could not be made because "Yukkuris are Trash because I Said So and Your Points are Invalid in This World I built". In the end, I just want to clarify that Yukkuri fandom had somewhat gone mainstream and there was a large variety of works involving Yukkuris and many works have different definitions for what Yukkuris are. Not everyone who are interested in Yukkuris are psychopaths but nonetheless you should be aware of the agency in some of these works.

And even more disturbing is the realization that Yukkuri are often depicted to reflect characters of pet animals in the real world. Dogs are often not very smart and will defecate anywhere they want without proper training. Cats does not show respect or servitude towards humans and behave as if they are the true owners of the household. And animals in general are sexually deviant and have no sense of shame comparable to humans and things like rape is very common for many even intelligent animals. Animal abusers often judge the animals with human standards and finds them disgusting, pathetic and deserving of torture. This is often the way animal abusers justify their deplorable actions as they derive feelings of superiority from harming "inferior" creatures. The reason Yukkuri are often created as deplorable semi humans capable of speech while also being supposedly only made up of food instead of flesh (they are living mochi buns) is so that people into animal torture or torture (cont)

@Leon Scott Kennedy You do realize that Yukkuri don't exist in real life and are created by a fringe sect of the Touhou fandom, right? That means all the world settings about the Yukkuri are arbitrary canon decided by the individual authors. And as fictional creatures, they serve to push the rhetoric and the ideals of the author. To make my point short, Yukkuri, and their low intellect, bad morality and nasty (while also sometimes cute) physique are created purposefully by the author in order to make torture porn without the controversy and social baggage of depicting torture of real world subjects such as animals and humans.

Summary of what I understood: this yukkuri was adopted heartily by a  lady, saving her from death. This Yukkuri is a shithead who has been spoiled like a princess, one day she wakes up at a stranger's house and is tortured, this yukkuri will then show her real face which is that of a haughty whore (P3 "But if Reimyu died, it'll be like welcoming a global loss, so god guided mish owner to Reimyu's side, definitely") , egosentric,  hypocritical and ungrateful, P27 wishing several times the death and the return of the "bitch of lady" who had saved and fed him (she is illogical, proof of her low IQ).  The executioner will reveal to her (knows that she will not understand anything) that she is the victim of a system of yukkuri traffic (the yukkuri owners give to false protection associations and then to anti yukkuri, their objective being to reduce  the deibus by exterminating them), the bitch does not understand a single word.
